page.title: 13Sutton on Sea Primary School
page.content: The school is on Station Rd.The main building is about 80 years old and the new one was built in 1969.We have about 160 children and 7 teachers and a Secretary, Caretaker,Ancillary, dinner ladies and cooks.The school covers about 2-3 acres.We have a big apparatus section on the field with a rope pulley,climbing frame,swings etc. The Hall was a classroom but now it has a stage for plays and apparatus for PE.We have interviewed some of the people who work at the school.{Mrs J. {Richardson}is the school Secretary. She has been working at the school for about 8\ years.She thinks our new headmaster{Mr Jones}is very nice to work with.She likes typing but she also collects money.She uses about 5 sheets of paper a day but if she is duplicating she uses a lot more.She wishes to stay in Sutton all her life.
